media.title: How to Tie a Tie: A Beginner's Guide

mainContent.author: CollegeHumor
mainContent.description: Never learned to tie a tie? Just watch this simple how-to video, you-cough-manchild-cough.

comment.sentence:
im not a 13 year old boy.
im a 13 year old girl!lol ;p
He was completely correct. I'm a 20-something man-child, and my dad was an alcoholic deadbeat who taught me nothing in life. How did he know?
When does "How to Drink Water" come out? I keep drowning.

Okay I love this guy. Full homo. And by full homo, I actually mean not in a gay way at all. The different "characters" he plays are perfect. And by perfect, I mean he sucks. (YES i'm new here, and YES my jokes aren't funny, nor are they jokes.)
unfunny jokes are ok, but do they have to be offensive? there is no way to use the phase "full homo" and "actually mean not in a gay way". just say he sucks.

I find this really offensive. I had to wear a tie for the first time in my life last year (grade 11), nobody in my family ever wears a tie (my dad has only wore one for high school and his wedding). I get this sh*t all the time from people saying I can't tie a tie, so f*ck you people. You are getting my first ever down vote collegehumor I hope you are happy
Probably the funniest video on there account
Hei genius next time less insults (even through most of them are true point taken) and more time explaning how is it done you missed a step
Fuck it. I'm going with the zip up. PS. learn how to iron your tight ass shirt, DICK.
